organization.name: Beijing Zhaotianxia Education Technology Co., Ltd.

slogans: Remember, not making a decision IS a decision, it's just a decision to do nothing - and it's usually the worst decision you can make.
Life is too short not to embrace new challenges. To take on any challenge in life and fail is very honorable.
The future is not something we enter. The future is something we create.
If you can dream - and not make dreams your master.
You can never plan the future by the past.
You do not have to run with the crowd - but you should not run against it.
Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
